content:
advertisement

Tim Tasker is an adventurous fellow PERIOD

This summer he crossed the Atlantic went to Paris and hitchhiked to Berlin for a weekend all for the sheer experience of culture and writing PERIOD

Tasker who graduated from the University in August recently returned to State College to promote his book Grateful Deads Book of Lyrics  PERIOD

Taskers Grateful Dead book contains lyrics to  songs and dates and places where the songs were first played PERIOD He says he wrote it because he felt many people who have acquired a taste for the bands music do not know the words to many of the songs PERIOD

Now Tasker is working on a book chronicling his experiences as a traveler in America and Europe PERIOD

 Tasker said with a thick native British accent PERIOD

Presently he is trying to kill two birds with one stone recording his American encounters for the travel book as he crosses the country promoting his Grateful Dead book PERIOD Tasker plans to return to Europe in March and gather the remaining material for the travel book by going back through France and Germany PERIOD

With the money he saved from parttime work and through the help of his parents Tasker got a start on his book over the summer PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

Tasker tried to meet as many French people as he could and he claimed it was no small accomplishment PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

Tasker said he believes the Western stereotype of the rude Frenchman is a misconception PERIOD

 he explained PERIOD

During one weekend in July Tasker hitchhiked through two countries to attend The Wall concert in Berlin PERIOD He said the assembled crowd amazed him PERIOD

 Tasker said PERIOD

In light of all that has happened in Berlin over the past year he said he found a special feeling in the city PERIOD He observed both East and West Berliners chipping away with small hammers at the few small chunks of the wall still remaining PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

Douglas Pederson professor of speech communications is not surprised by the course his former student has taken PERIOD

 Pederson said PERIOD

Tasker said he is writing his newest book in the style of Jack Kerouacs On the Road  a work he said has had a major influence on him PERIOD He writes while traveling as the experiences come upon him PERIOD

 he explained PERIOD
